name: Wizards RPG
description:
This is an early prototype of an action rpg hack and slash game I want to create.

As with all my prototypes, this is something I enjoy making and chances are these will never be fully released but I do wish I had the time/money or courage to do it.

CONTROLS:
WASD movement
LMB/RMB attack with different combo's, every character has 10 combo's performed by which order you click your mouse.
SPACE block/evade
ESC menu

PLANNED:
- more worlds/levels to visit
- quests and more monsters to kill
- leveling up and configure your own combo attacks
- multiplayer
- much more
